Uses of Class
org.fest.assertions.FloatAssert.Delta

Uses of FloatAssert.Delta in org.fest.assertions
 

Methods in org.fest.assertions that return FloatAssert.Delta
static FloatAssert.Delta FloatAssert.delta(float d)
          Creates a new holder for a delta value to be used in FloatAssert.isEqualTo(float, org.fest.assertions.FloatAssert.Delta).
 

Methods in org.fest.assertions with parameters of type FloatAssert.Delta
 FloatAssert FloatAssert.isEqualTo(float expected, FloatAssert.Delta delta)
          Verifies that the actual float value is equal to the given one, within a positive delta.
